website_summaries.verdict: This model is a good pick if you don't want a lot of fancy features or a monitor that takes effort to learn to operate.
pros: Tracks weight and body fat and water levels, and is programmable for 2 users
cons: Mixed opinions from owners on accuracy
Doesn't have a lot of bells and whistles

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent weight readings
customer_reviews.text: I have owned/used different scales including Tanita over the years. This model is by far gives the most inconsistent readings. Within a 5 minute period when I was taking different readings to confirm the accuracy, I "gained"/"lost" about 0.5 kg equivalent of about 1 lb. My muscle mass and water % also changed by about 1.5% during that time. It is my own fault that I did not check that this item is not returnable. Either splurge on the best quality Tanita model or just buy cheaper scales with a consistent weight.
customer_reviews.author: Katya Belkina

customer_reviews.title: Great scale.
customer_reviews.text: This scale is particular with how you stand on it and consistency with respect to % body fat measurements. At first they were all over the map, but now I am careful in foot placement, and now readings are more precise. I like that there are two channels for two peple, plus a guest mode, and there is a weight only mode as well that I used to use before I figured out the foot placement. Now I measure everything every day and pay attention to the week averages. Very happy with this scale.
customer_reviews.author: McVeyMac

customer_reviews.title: Broken in two months.
customer_reviews.text: Two months after purchase the scale is broken. The scale won't stay at zero but jumps to both positive and negative numbers. I can't get an accurate reading. I guess this is why we should purchase at a brick and mortar, atleast I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: djtisanidiot

customer_reviews.title: Replacement of product
customer_reviews.text: This product is broken and can't be set, which makes It useless! It can't be sent back for a replacement which was not specified when ordering. Doesn't even deserve a one star rating!!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca jo mertens

customer_reviews.title: How accurate is it really?
customer_reviews.text: I have placed this scale to be sure it is on a hard flat surface. I weigh myself without clothes on. And yet my weight can vary .4 lbs per weighing. I know this because I weigh myself more than once (within a minute of the first weighing). I know .4 lbs isn't much of a difference, but I am on a weightloss program and need the scale results to be accurate. I want to be encouraged or discouraged accurately. So far I am opting to choose the lowest of the 3 weighings within a few minutes period as my result for the day! Like I said, looking for encouragement!
customer_reviews.author: AZKP

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great scale, met our needs, lasted 10 years. Batteries corroded, couldn't get it to work after that (not a fault of the scale). We just used it for weight, never used the extra functions. Very consistent measure even on a tiled surface.
customer_reviews.author: amanda77kr

customer_reviews.title: my second Tanita
customer_reviews.text: one day, my old one just stopped working. I've used that one for the last 20 years. (!!) I am guessing finally moisture got inside since I had it in my bathroom. So, I went out to find a replacement, and this is my comparison of old and new; liked: how thin it is, easy to clean, can save 2 people information, shows hydration level, and of course the price do not care for: smaller increment (was 0.5lb increment on my old Tanita but the new one shows 0.2lb increment) just because it shows me EXACTLY how much i weigh ;) Overall: I love it!
customer_reviews.author: C Fiera

customer_reviews.title: Tanita Makes the Most Accurate Scales for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I won't buy any other brand. Unless you buy an expensive balance scale, Tanita bathroom scales are the most accurate for body weight. They also last a long time. I tried another brand and it lasted only 2 years and my Tanita is still going strong after many years! Quality manufacturing and accuracy go with Tanita. They are the best out there. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LynneB

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SCALES OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: My tried and true scales (same model) after many years of use, finally gave up the ghost. I went to Walmart and purchased 3 different varieties of scales. NONE EVEN COMPARED! They were not consistent at all. So I decided to search for the same brand as my prior reliable scales, and I was so happy to find the Tania brand still exists. These scales are quality! They sense even the slightest changes in weight. I will never buy another brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Behunin

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale to track my body fat %. I expected it to be at least somewhat accurate or consistent. Instead I get huge fluctuations in body fat %, even if it is just an hour apart and I didn’t change my diet/exercise, etc. I did follow the instructions and check it at the same time and conditions. It does give me the accurate weight. But, it wasn’t the purpose why I bought this scale. I would get a much cheaper product for measuring just the weight. So, now I am stuck with the product I don’t need. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy is a bit off.
customer_reviews.text: I own a few scales already but I really like this brand and I bought it for the water reading. My other scales dont have that particular reading. So, It's not very accurate in my opinion. It runs higher. I'll get on my other more expensive scales to compare and both the body fat and weight are off. The water reading isnt very helpful. I still like the brand...just not this model.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Health Tool and is consistent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great features. Has ability to use for 2 different people and a feature that can be used for just straight weighing. This is my 2nd Tanita. I've had a couple of others including WW. Tanita gives the same weight if you weigh in just a few minutes later. Other scales fluctuate up to 2 lbs if you rest in just a few minutes. Tanita is a great health tool. My last one lasted more than 10 years. Hope this one does as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tyla

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It was broken. It gave myself and family members different weights and body fat % every time we stood on it. I literally stepped on, stepped off, stepped back on and it was different. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kivisto

customer_reviews.title: Great and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Awesome scale! Memory for two users and a gust function allows anyone to use this device. It’s as accurate as my old scale and the hospital’s scale but with added function of bmi. So glad I bought this. It’s way more substantial than the old scale; this was built to last.
customer_reviews.author: passat driver

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale, it measures body water and fat. This was no better time for me to purchase this because I am changing my food habits now and this helps me to see my progress. It also keeps track of you weight record. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased another digital scale and every time I stepped on it (after just having gotten off of it), I got a different weight - sometimes varying as much as several pounds. It was frustrating to say the least. Knowing that Weight Watchers uses Tanita scales I decided to purchase a modestly priced one. This one has surpassed my expectations. The best part is that it weighs EXACTLY the same as the scale at the Weight Watcher meetings. It has settings for different users plus just a weight option. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: It’s the best scale I’ve ever had in my life!!
customer_reviews.text: The Tanita scale is awesome!! I’ve never seen or heard of a scale that has as these functions; not in in a dr’s office! I would recommend this scale to all my family and friends. I am so glad I took J J Smith the nutritionist advice to purchase this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these everyday to track his weight for wrestling. They're accurate and, more importantly, consistent!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy LeMaster

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Somewhat Useful
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this scale for some time now. It weighs accurately and the BMI measurements, though variable, are useful. By variable I mean that the algorithm that calculates BMI is not always capable of distinguishing between body fluids, Intestinal contents, or states of hydration. If you sweat profusely during exercise you will get a different reading post-exercise BMI than you had in the morning. Same thing about bowel contents. The readings can change after you relieve yourself. But, all in all, the BMI readings are within a given range, so if you do lose weight you will see the trend line going down.
customer_reviews.author: Goldry Bluzco

customer_reviews.title: First one lasted 12 years. Ordered another one!
customer_reviews.text: My last one lasted over 12 years. So, I decided to order another one. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hayes

customer_reviews.title: An excellent scale - appropriately accurate for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't necessarily trust the body fat monitor (so many issues with measuring body fat via electrical pulse), but it is appropriately accurate for its cost (so, probably good within 10%). The same for the weight - Measurements are the same every time within .6 lbs or less. Definitely not accurate to .2 lbs, but I doubt any of the scales you'll find on here are for a comparable price. And really, you do not need to measure yourself so accurately, even for weight loss - .2 lbs is the size of a sandwich. If you want to measure a baby, get a baby scale, if you want to measure a small animal, get a different scale.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M. Haig

customer_reviews.title: but we had one just like it for years and it gave great service
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this scale about a month, but we had one just like it for years and it gave great service. About as close to your actual weight as most any scale as long as you keep it on a hard floor and about the same location always. I would definitely recommend this model to anyone wanting a good scale.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Moisture is a great enemy of digital scales so
customer_reviews.text: Moisture is a great enemy of digital scales so, this one was stationed in a climate controlled area. Since it's still relatively new, I cannot attest as to the duration of it's service life nor to body fat/water readings since I'm only interested in my weight, belt size. 5 star rating based on accuracy as compared to a professional Physician's scale. It is simple to operate, easy to read and powers itself off.
customer_reviews.author: RollzaBenz37

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and accurate information
customer_reviews.text: THis unit was very simple to use and provide accurate information. We have old Tanita unit also for last 10-15 years. We are very happy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaze

customer_reviews.title: Great scale.
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a previous Tanita scale which lasted about 15 years. Great scale.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysCurious

customer_reviews.title: Great as a scale. Skip the body fat function.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this scale for four years. It is very durable, easy to use and, most importantly, extremely accurate. I have tested it against other more expensive scales and also tested it with known weights. The body fat monitor function is, however, a joke. It's not close to accurate or consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scale for the price
customer_reviews.text: Reliable and lasts. Battery works for months on end. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: great scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale is accurate and having 2 person settings is really nice. The feature of being able to weigh a 3rd person and not bothering the 2 person settings is a real plus to me. You can also see the day before weight which is helpful. I have recommended this scale to others already. It has a nice sleek and clean look and fits my decor nicely. I really do not have a bad thing to say about it. I can step on it several times and get the same reading. The .2 increments is very helpful when one is on a very specific diet and need to have that feature.
customer_reviews.author: lfellmann

customer_reviews.title: A decent scale
customer_reviews.text: It is not as solid and pretty as it seems but it serves the purpose In that price range. The weight accuracy is about 95%. I find it a bit hard to read the number in low light surrounding.
customer_reviews.author: Meja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am in Weight Watchers and this scale is in line with their scale. Hurray!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The body fat percentage function is not at all accurate. They don't allow for returns. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scale for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and it helps with our body fat ratio!
customer_reviews.author: HugoCat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and accurate. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. I have confirmed the accuracy by using my 10lb weight to confirm it's accuracy. It has many settings but I only use it for the weight. I've had it for about 4 mos. now. The weight tells you extremely detailed right down to the ounces. Love the scale.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cats love it
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the cats feel the need to sit on this everyday.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: After 20 years, my other Tanita finally quit. I wouldn't consider a different brand. This scale is easy to use and has a stored setting for two people.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This scale is easy to program for two regular users and has a "guest" setting for those who aren't regular but want to read more than just weight. The readings are consistent, unlike many digital scales, and easy to pick up once you've done it a few times. It's not the cheapest home scale offered but it is worth the money for those who want to track their fitness. It looks nice almost anywhere, too.
customer_reviews.author: R. SELIG

customer_reviews.title: Best scale I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recommended this scale to me and I can see why! I feel it's completely accurate and is motivating to have a scale you can rely on. I got the scale less than 24hrs of ordering too which I thought was fantastic! For women, its a little confusing why the instructions state to weigh yourself before dinner for more accuracy but as long as you are consistant with weighing yourself at the same time each time, I think you'll find it to be quite accurate!
customer_reviews.author: LadyHawk89

customer_reviews.title: Smart scale
customer_reviews.text: I like this scale and the set up was easy and quick. The readings include body fat ratio and it seems higher than what the BMI charts show. Weight seems to be calibrated well and keeps a record of your progress. The third reading on the scale is water percentage of your body weight. Helps me to keep myself hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Bren910

customer_reviews.title: I had it for years and was sad to see it go
customer_reviews.text: I had the earlier version of this without the water feature. I had it for years and was sad to see it go. However, now that I have the newer version, I like it even more! A well made product that both will last a long time and be accurate...
customer_reviews.author: Debra Korenic

customer_reviews.title: Extremely accurate
customer_reviews.text: As a competitive wrestler, this scale helps me keep my track of my weight. The official scales used are Tanita, and this scale is always spot on to what I need. The body fat is fairly accurate. For a scale that measures body fat, this scale is as accurate as it can get.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Romney

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: This works as described. Easy to use. Good price. I'm weight training, 67 year old woman, to replace atrophied muscles. I like to see if I'm loosing weight or muscle. update. It quite working the day the warrenty ran out. It was replaced for free but it cost me $20 to ship. The replacement doesn't give the bmi like the original one did. Not going to mess with it again. too bad.
customer_reviews.author: charily

customer_reviews.title: Inconsisent results
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this scale for a couple of months and have seen inconsistent results with it. You can step off and then right back on and see up to a 4 oz difference on a flat surface. Just not a fan. Would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Best scale so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those people that weigh themselves every day and so I've gone through a few digital scales in my time. Based on a little web research I settled on this scale for my current morning bad news machine. I'ts by far the most accurate and repeatable (digital) scale I've used so far, and I've compared it side by side with the professional scale in my gym to confirm that. I think the body fat measurement and % water retention are useless gimicks (like all such features) but for weight measurement alone, two thumbs up. Lets see if it last more than 12months (the average life of a digital scale in my experience).
customer_reviews.author: M. Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Seems that my hydration and body fat do not vary much. Scale accurate to doctor's.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: This product works well.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these products before for years and loved it. I also love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Scale that Measures Body Fat and Body Water
customer_reviews.text: We love being able to check our body fat and body water content. It's also great to see our weight in small increments rather than rounded, i.e., 108.6 rather than 109. Our first scale stopped working after three months; however, Tanita quickly replaced it with a new one that has been fine. We purchased a 2nd scale as a Christmas gift and expect that the recipient will be equally pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Boston

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product
customer_reviews.text: I have two now. It's perfect for managing daily weight and bmi index w memory. Easy to use and read with setting for two people and a guest setting. Easy to clean and sleek. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AEH

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: The Tanita scale does everything its supposed to and is very easy to operate. Once you set up your information it is easy to track your weigh-in history, which helps you stay on track. The only thing you have to remember is to step on the scale barefoot if you want to get your fat and water percentage readings.
customer_reviews.author: Terrianne Stjern

customer_reviews.title: complicated to operate.  Battery powered only
customer_reviews.text: complicated to operate. Battery powered only. to small. you operate the controls with your big toe. how stupid is that?
customer_reviews.author: HP Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Second one I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Second one I have purchased. The first one lasted over 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t weight anymore! Pun intended. Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, because he loves the one I bought a year ago. It’s just a great scale, for a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stoller

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the large, visible numbers and the 2 personal data options we can use to review and compare our personal weight information. The fat % and body water % are also great features!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This scale is not accurate. Gives a different reading ...
customer_reviews.text: This scale is not accurate. Gives a different reading every time. I'm very irritated that I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scale. Looks stylish as well. Solidly built.
customer_reviews.text: I got this scale to help with my weight loss. The old cheapie bathroom scale we had would give you a different reading (off 2-4 pounds every time) every time you stepped on it. This scale gives you the same readout each time. I even use it to weigh items I'm going to mail with the guest mode. With .2 pound increments, this is quite accurate as well. I love this scale. The metal finish looks great and it sure is solidly built. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barb H

customer_reviews.title: Questionable.
customer_reviews.text: Clunky, only store two people info and body fat % is questionable as I got different results on another scale. Can I still return?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Scale!
customer_reviews.text: This scale gives me a different number each time I step on. It worked fine for the first 3 months and then became erratic. This morning it gave me 120.2, 117.4 and then 119.2. Absolutely useless if you want to watch your weight. I had a Tanita scale for 10 years before buying this one. Quality has plummeted. I replaced this scale with a simple scale that is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of a reader

customer_reviews.title: Love this scale it’s my second o
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale but it broke I bought it last May of 2017 & I don’t know how to replace it
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the body fat button does not work too much of a hassle to return
customer_reviews.author: Love Hard

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Its the best scale I have ever owned. And it keeps track of two people. Plus the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Madame des Jardins

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It works great, is very very accurate, and it's durable. Make sure it's on a flat even surface though!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good scale. Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to tell how much of my weight is water and how much is fat. The scale is easy to use and program. The only downside is that it's not backlit. I knew this ahead of time and it is ok since I usually use it in a lit bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Defects happen but good integrity counts
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the concept is great but the one I got was defective. I appreciated that when I asked for a refund it was given without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Tanita scale years ago at a yard sale and it finally died. This is much more convenient since I don't need to enter my height every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: james steel

customer_reviews.title: Great Body Fat Scale for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive scale is a great way to measure your body fat and monitor it over time, especially if you're working out or just trying to stay slim. I weigh myself the same day (and about the same time) each week to be consistent and jot it down. Don't measure BF in the morning because you are dehydrated somewhat when you wake and the reading will be off. Good home product.
customer_reviews.author: Workout King

customer_reviews.title: A good basic scale
customer_reviews.text: The body fat monitor is not particularly useful unless you use it immediately after taking a shower or bath when your skin moisture level is consistent. The scale will provide very large variations in body fat and water content if you go from a bath, to taking off slippers, to walking barefoot. It could be the climate has a large influence here as the humidity is quite low and so skin moisture can really vary depending upon dress and time of the day. The scale on the other hand is very accurate and I have checked it against some known weights and found it to constantly be within a few ounces even on heavy objects.
customer_reviews.author: Seppi

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Only request would be a backlight. The LCD is a bit hard to read depending on ambient lighting. All the other features work and the scale seems to be precise, though I have no way to confirm its accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Cousins

customer_reviews.title: Met all expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model which lasted many years. I simply ordered the current version and it works exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Joann M. Horn

customer_reviews.title: It's the coolest!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scale and well worth the very reasonable price. Easy to program, and the readout is big enough for me to read. The instruction book is clearly written and explains why fat percentage readings seem to fluctuate depending on the time of day. I get my most consistent readings around bedtime. It weighs me a tad heavier than my old scale (bummer), but that's MY problem! This scale will definitely be a help in my fitness/diet program.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Item from "competitive edge" are defective and carry no manufacturer warranty. Buy at ur own risk
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! I've had this for about 6 years now, and after multiple accidents and heavy items dropped on this scale, with a cracked screen and most of the features other than weighing yourself not working anymore, this scale is still very precise! We have recently purchased another one, a little cheaper, but lighter, prettier and newer, and Tanita is much more accurate even as beat up as it is right now. Oh, and since the purchase day I haven't replaced the batteries, yet. Maybe those features will start working again, if I put new batteries? Gotta check. It really is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: not quite there
customer_reviews.text: The scale is ok. Think the calculation on hydrationis off no matter how much water I consume. Have to stand on scale twice to get a good reading.
customer_reviews.author: Diva180

customer_reviews.title: Always accurate
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this set of scales....I am a Weight Watcher member and this scales is always right on, each and every time you step on it... I would recommend it to all my friend and family... and I wouldn't want to be without mine.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Despain

customer_reviews.title: Love the scale!!
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very accurate in terms of weight. The body fat % can fluctuate a little depending on water retention of my body but is very consistent to monitor my body fat. The battery lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: Saori

customer_reviews.title: The Tanita scale was a replacement for the same model ...
customer_reviews.text: The Tanita scale was a replacement for the same model I had for at least 20 years. This scale measures to the 1/10 of a pound so every little bit helps.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Joseph Moreau

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Works great! Exactly what I wanted. Got it to replace an older Tanita. Tanita is the only brand I would buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nitedawg

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: Percent body fat and percent water are not very repeatable. I didn't really care about absolute accuracy, but counted on being able to monitor the trends. Too many variables (temperature, moisture, whatever) make those readings so inconsistent, that I don't bother with it anymore. Also, the readout is not lighted and the display is black on gray, so you have to turn on the lights to see it. Inconvenient where we use it as the light would wake my wife. The scale seems fine, but a step back from where we were; the other had a blue LED display.
customer_reviews.author: JBG

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, Accurate, and Consistent
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this scale for around 18 months without any issues. Spot on with other, more expensive, scales. I would purchase another if needed. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lonneville

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scale
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 4 years now and never had a problem. We all use it in the house so it is very durable, it has not even worn a little. It works great and is super useful with all the data it saves. Would definitely recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Gorsolio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Directions easy to follow. Works great. But I do think it says I weigh more than I do :) lol
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Adkins

customer_reviews.title: digital  scale
customer_reviews.text: Very good product--first scale I have ever had to calculate your body fat and percentage of water in your body. Easy to use and set up and I almost look forward to checking out my body fat and weight on a regular basis. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that is very conscious about their health .
customer_reviews.author: Ken R. Keeler

customer_reviews.title: The Tanita BF679W Duo Scale a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale for my husband, but I've also enjoyed using the product myself. The scale allows for more than one person to be registered in the computer. The product material is also very insightful-- for example, I learned that I get the best results when I weigh myself the same time each day (due to water fluctuations, etc.). I found this tip very useful, and the product also comes with some helpful grids to measure your progress. It's much easier to calculate my results when compared to other stats and averages.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruckheim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this handy bad boy every morning! Helps me keep on track!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is good overall. I've used it for about a month, and find the weight readings to be pretty accurate. At this point in time though I haven't noticed a change in the body fat percentage or water percentage. For this reason I give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is very good. I weigh myself every day and measure body ...
customer_reviews.text: It is Tanita. Of course, it is very good. I weigh myself every day and measure body fat, too.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey's housewife

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I look at the fat % as an estimate. Never take it too seriously just watch what you eat and exercise. Good battery life and usage life in general
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great scale!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I have had this 9 years!! Scale is accurate to my doctors scale, but not sure if the body fat scale is.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya C

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I compared readings to a high end Tanita ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I compared readings to a high end Tanita in a doctors office and the readings were almost identical.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Easy instuctions & easy to read display.
customer_reviews.text: We are using this scale to keep on track for better health.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kay

customer_reviews.title: 3 years of ownership, still works.
customer_reviews.text: After over 3 years of owning it, it still runs great. I've only had to change the batteries once.
customer_reviews.author: toby

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the toe kick switches. Good weight and fat % readouts. Quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: sbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product ---- great place to reference from for all my needs
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very accurate as a scale. Dont know about the body fat accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Accuracy Is Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale mainly because of it's ratings on being very accurate. Seems like it is, and back-to-back weighing usually shows no more than a .2 lb. difference.
customer_reviews.author: LarryC

customer_reviews.title: excellent bathroom scale
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bathroom scale I have had. It gives the same reading after steping off and on again. I beeps to let you know when the reading is available. Fairly simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Anjel

customer_reviews.title: Works for Us
customer_reviews.text: Pretty consistent and the added info is fun to get.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like my last one from Tanita, it is a great quality scale.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This scale uses an algorithm to"calculate" data. It doesn't really measure.
customer_reviews.author: fayeweezer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last year and it works 6 months only
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This scale is a great improvement on my old one. The weight, body fat, and hydration measurements are always consistent, making me assume they are pretty accurate. Great scale for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Sent as shown.  Worthy of trust.
customer_reviews.text: Sent as shown. Worthy of trust. (PS: It lies!!!) :)

product_meta.title: Tanita BF-679 Body Fat/Body Water Scale
product_meta.description:
Do you want to lose weight or improve your total health and fitness? Then a Tanita BF-679W Body Fat / Body Water Monitor is the right addition to your routine. A weight scale alone is not enough. This monitor calculates body fat and body water levels using bioelectric impedance analysis (BIA); sending a safe, low-level electrical signal through the body. The BF-679 does not include Athlete Mode.

AMAZON.COM
The Tanita BF679W Duo Scale Plus Body Fat Monitor can monitor both your body fat and body water percentages. This scale also features a daily calorie intake function that estimates how many calories should be consumed in a 24-hour period for a user to maintain current weight level, and a dual recall feature that compares both 



The Tanita BF679W scale and body fat monitor delivers advanced body monitoring technology with a sleek, stylish design. View larger. Comprehensive body fat monitors for total health and fitness.current weight and body fat readings to the previous readings.  Why You Should Monitor Body Water and Fat Percentage
If you're like most people, you're not drinking enough water. If you wait until you feel thirsty, your body is already suffering from the effects of mild dehydration. You continually lose water during the day through sweat, urine and breathing. The amount varies due to several reasons, including your physical activity level, illness, medications, poor nutrition, or even climatic conditions. Monitoring your body water percentage allows you to quickly compensate if your levels are low, allowing your body to function more efficiently. Having the right amount of water in your body will not only make you feel healthier, but you'll also reduce your risk of developing serious health problems in the longer term.

 High body fat levels can reduce your endurance and have been linked to heart disease cancer and diabetes. Tanita's body composition analyzers monitor your body fat and body water levels with Bioelectric Impedance Analysis, or BIA, the same advanced technology used by doctors. Foot pads send a low-level electrical signal. Then BIA measures the resistance to this signal as it travels through the body. 

 The Tanita BF679W is calibrated for standard adults and children and stores data for 2 people and measures body fat in increments of 0.5 percentage points. This scale also features a guest mode, allowing you to use the unit without losing information already assigned to the personal keys. The scale's large, easy-to-read 2.25-inch, 2-line LCD shows weight and body fat simultaneously, and instantly compares these readings to healthy ranges based on the user's age and gender. Simply supply your gender, age, height and weight into the memory, step on the scale, and the monitor does the rest. The results are analyzed according to each user's information, and the result is the one of the most comprehensive at-home readings you can get.

 
Operating on four AA batteries (included), the Tanita BF679W is intended for use by persons up to 300 pounds and is backed by Tanita's three-year warranty. 

 


Body fat percentages are important indicators of good health. View larger. Note: Pregnant women should not use this monitor, and if you have a pacemaker or other internal electronic medical device, you should not use the body fat reading feature.
feature_bullets: Great body fat / body water scale
Perfect for any health or fitness plan
Memory function for 2 adults, review past readings
